body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting CarDeals Inc. My name is Thomas Adams. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Betty. Can you please provide me with your email address and phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is betty.kelly@gmail.com and my phone number is five five five one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Betty. I have noted down your email address and phone number. Now, could you tell me the reason for your call today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I am calling about a return I need to make at your dealership. I'm feeling sad about it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Betty. We will do our best to assist you with the return process. Can you please provide me with the details of the item you wish to return?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's a red sedan that I purchased two zero days ago.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for letting me know, Betty. We will ensure that this issue is resolved promptly. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Betty. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a great day!
